sourcesContent:
<template>
<el-aside>
  <el-menu>
    <el-menu-item v-for="blog of mainBlogs" :key="blog">
      {{blog.title}}
    </el-menu-item>
  </el-menu>
</el-aside>
<el-main>
  首页内容
</el-main>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios'

export default {
  name: "mainPage",
  data(){
    return{
      mainBlogs:[]
    }
  },
  computed: {

  },
  methods:{
    getBlog(){
      axios.get('/server/allBlogs')
          .then((response)=>{
            this.mainBlogs.push(response.data)
          })
          .catch((e)=>{
            console.log(e)
          })
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getBlog()
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
